typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@ProductCategoryID == source2@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sort(asc(ProductID, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 filter(StandardCost<'1000') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
